name: Apophis
desc: Apophis is a near-Earth asteroid approximately 370 meters in diameter...

name: Bennu
desc: Bennu is a carbonaceous near-Earth asteroid about 490 meters in diameter...

name: Florence
desc: Florence is one of the largest known near-Earth asteroids...

name: 2023 DW
desc: 2023 DW is a recently discovered asteroid approximately 50 meters in diameter...

name: Didymos
desc: Didymos is a binary asteroid system consisting of a primary asteroid...

name: Toutatis
desc: Toutatis is a highly elongated asteroid (~4.5 km long)...

name: Ryugu
desc: Ryugu is a C-type asteroid with a diameter of ~900 meters...

name: Ganymed
desc: Ganymed is the largest known near-Earth asteroid at over 35 km in diameter...

name: Phaethon
desc: Phaethon is an unusual near-Earth object in that it behaves like a hybrid asteroid-comet...

name: 1998 OR2
desc: 1998 OR2 is a stony asteroid approximately 2.1 kilometers in diameter...
